findings.message:
Reentrancy_bonus.withdrawReward (reentrancy_bonus.sol#16-21) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- (success) = recipient.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() (reentrancy_bonus.sol#19)
findings.name: arbitrary-send

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_bonus.getFirstWithdrawalBonus (reentrancy_bonus.sol#23-30):
	External calls:
	- withdrawReward(recipient) (reentrancy_bonus.sol#28)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- claimedBonus (reentrancy_bonus.sol#29)
findings.name: reentrancy-eth

findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in reentrancy_bonus.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (reentrancy_bonus.sol#7): it allows old versions
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Low level call in Reentrancy_bonus.withdrawReward (reentrancy_bonus.sol#16-21):
	-(success) = recipient.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() reentrancy_bonus.sol#19
findings.name: low-level-calls

findings.message: Reentrancy_bonus.userBalances (reentrancy_bonus.sol#12) is never used in Reentrancy_bonus
findings.name: unused-state
